name: Hidden words - 1
description:
4000 x 4000 px. From the generative program "Hidden words": A text resides in the computer and is displayed on a screen. However, it remains indecipherable, because the software continuously invents new logographic symbols, from Béziers curves in three dimensions, to represent each word. It generates them, permutes them, and thus continuously creates a new writing system, a new code of representation of thought. "Silent words" is part of a research that explores the relationship between gesture and sign, as other works explore the relationship between music and language. I will quote as a reference Brion Gysin, whose pictorial research tended to rid writing of the signifier and semantics in order to invent an imagined and silent thought. 

https://vimeo.com/218768330
https://www.ericvernhes.com/project/mots_silencieux/
